text: remember the protest movement that's
been attacking government buildings
claimed to be acting in defense of the
monarchy there are intense expressions
of affection for the king even a belief
that the monarchy is somehow threatened
by the current government so it was
never likely that they would carry on
fighting on the Kings birthday they
always made it clear that they would
calm things down in the end some
last-minute negotiations while the
frantic ones involved in the armed
forces managed to persuade the police to
allow protesters to go in for some
symbolic occupations of government
buildings and everyone cleaned up and
got everything ready for today now the
celebrations are taking place down
mostly in the coastal resort of Hua Hin
where the king is and we've had this
very formal occasion that happens every
year where the king was driven in-state
into this hole and was able to give his
address everybody hangs on that address
every year he is elevated to this
revered position at the apex of
Thailand's hierarchy and in the past
people have always believed that his
words could offer comfort and soothe
conflicts given how frail he is he
really struggled to get through his
speech this year and spoke very slowly
it was a short message simply alluded to
the need for people to do their job
their duty to support each other for the
sake of the country that will be taken
to heart there was some very emotional
people in the crowd way too degree sure
him that's partly because they can see
how frail he is banana cherry you know
unlike times past I don't think anybody
imagines that this King now can do very
much to resolving the very deep conflict
in Thai politics
